name: Chained Tractor Towing Car
description:
Drive your Chained Tractor Towing Car for transportation in wonderful and amazing top offroad driving game. Tow your city car with chain of heavy duty tractor pull and push car with tractor sled for driving bus to transport it to destination

Features:
Stunning 3D HD graphics.
Realistic mountainous environment with breathtaking visuals.
Multiple challenging levels.
Limited time slot to complete the level.
Realistic experience of farming tractar chained bus transport.
Realistic sounds effects.
Real-time physics simulation.
